issue.title: [CF 1468] suggestion for is icon shown condition
issue.body:
when is icon shown condition is not that many, getting the number of each icon is not much chore but if it has many is icon shown condition and you have to revise them for some reason, it becomes real head scratcher. so can we import the icon number of a certain icon in a similar way like when you import icon id(shift-right clicking an icon)? it would be a very good feature and much easier to toy with tmw. thank you


> Posted by CurseForge user daesani00 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1468 | Raw

comments.body:
You can right-click-and-drag one icon to another to add it as an Icon Is Shown condition. From there you can reorder it as needed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
